name: Tuque Games
description:
Over here at Tuque Games we love gaming. We play games that provide players with meaningful choices. We founded the studio back in 2012 with the goal of assembling an all-star crew of developers to make outstanding games. Our first title, Livelock, established a creative new IP as well as a solid foundation to grow the studio and the games we love to make.
We're making the kind of games we love to play - and it just so happens a lot of other gamers like to play them as well! Every day we strive to impress and delight players around the world and when we manage to make them smile, it's all worth it.
address: 4767 Dagenais St Suite 205, Montreal, QC H4C 1L8, Canada

name: Unity Technologies
description: Unity is the world’s leading platform for creating and operating real-time 3D (RT3D) content. Creators, ranging from game developers to artists, architects, automotive designers, filmmakers, and others, use Unity to make their imaginations come to life. Unity’s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices. The company’s 1,400+ person research and development team keeps Unity at the forefront of development by working alongside partners to ensure optimized support for the latest releases and platforms. Apps developed by Unity creators were downloaded more than three billion times per month in 2019 on more than two billion unique devices.

name: WB Games Montréal
description: The studio is lead by Martin Tremblay and aims to staff up to 300 people by 2015.
address: 888 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montreal, Montréal, QC H3B, Canada

name: Yellow Brick Games
description:
Founded in 2020 and currently 13 employees, Yellow Brick Games is a collection of great people wanting to make incredible experiences. We have our eyes set on the triple-I space where we will deliver top-tier emergent game experiences in new, fantastic worlds.
We are a company that values people over everything; brick by brick we are going to make that golden path of ethical development in our studio. At the same time, we are determined to deliver an incredible journey for all players to adventure down, like our inspiration: our warrior princess Dorothée.
address: 585 Boulevard Charest E, Quebec City, QC G1K 3J2, Canada

name: Rovio Entertainment
description: The Company is best known for the global Angry Birds brand, which started as a popular mobile game in 2009, and has since evolved from games to various entertainment and consumer products in brand licensing. Today, the Company offers multiple mobile games, animations and has produced The Angry Birds Movie, which opened number one in theatres in 50 countries and the sequel of which is in production. Rovio is headquartered in Finland and the company’s shares are listed on the main list of the NASDAQ Helsinki stock exchange with the trading code ROVIO.

name: Saber Interactive
description:
Saber Interactive is a game development studio founded in 2001. It became part of Embracer Group on April 1, 2020. Our games are well-known all around the world, including World War Z, MudRunner, SnowRunner, Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo: The Master Chief Collection, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt on Nintendo Switch, Crysis Remastered, Quake Champions, NBA Playgrounds, TimeShift, and many more. Our main focus is on AAA and console game production. Some of our projects are published by partner companies like Microsoft, CD Projekt Red, 2K, Crytek, Tripwire Interactive, Focus Home Interactive, Bethesda, Ubisoft, Konami, and others.
We also create mobile games, including NBA Playgrounds Mobile, Era Сombat, and I, Viking, available in select regional stores. With more than 700 specialists on board, Saber Interactive is one of the largest game development teams in the world. The company is headquartered in the United States, with regional offices in Saint Petersburg, Russia (our biggest team), Spain, Portugal, Belarus, and Sweden.
address: 2200 N Ocean Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33305, USA

name: Sabotage Studio
description: Sabotage is an indie video game studio founded by a dynamic duo of award winning game developers. Based in beautiful Quebec City, Canada, Sabotage aim to create remarkable titles for players who long for the charm of the games of their youth while embracing the advanced designs developed in recent years. We develop our own intellectual properties (Retro Gaming with a Modern Twist) and sometime do work for hire (Currently working on Oddworld: Soulstorm). We develop for PC and Consoles. (PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch).
address: 633 Rue Saint-Joseph E bureau 200, Quebec City, QC G1K 3C1, Canada

name: Sarbakan
description: Sarbakan is an innovative developer of social mobile games and mobile entertainment content. With over 17 years of proven experience as a game studio, Sarbakan delivers memorable and high quality experiences for its worldwide publishing partners and customers. Sarbakan has created over 800 titles since its inception and also offers a wide variety of mobile and digital console game development services. World-renowned media and entertainment giants turn to Sarbakan for its unique and insanely creative approach to creating original IPs. Sarbakan is strategically located in Quebec, QC, Canada. For more information, visit www.sarbakan.com.
address: 770 Rue Saint-Joseph E, Quebec City, QC G1K 3C3, Canada

name: Scavengers Studio
description: Founded in 2015, Scavengers Studio is an independent Montreal-based video games studio. Our team is composed of highly talented industry veterans who are driven by their mutual appetite for innovation and for shaping the future of the video game industry. We aim to create the next generation of high quality interactive experiences for players, streamers, and spectators while enabling creators to usher in a new age of gaming and media.
address: 3451 Boul St-Laurent, Montreal, QC H2X 2T6, Canada

name: Sleeping Beast Games
description: Sleeping Beast Games is an independent video game company based in Montréal, Québec, Canada. Our first game was award-winning party game "Spaceteam" which now has over 10 million downloads worldwide and several spin-off projects. We're now working on "Blabyrinth" (also award-winning!), a local multiplayer escape room for phones and tablets.
address: 5691 Avenue de l'Esplanade, Montreal, QC H2T 2Z9, Canada

name: Spearhead Games
description:
The studio was founded in 2012. Since then we have been on an incredible journey of sharing our vision of games with unique innovative experiences that we love and want to share with our fans.
The studio’s first title, cooperative action puzzler Tiny Brains for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3 and PC, followed the antics of four super-powered lab animals in their quest to escape a mad scientist’s nefarious tests. The studio’s next game, a competitive physics based video game called Arena Cyber Evolution (ACE), is an experiment in community development.

name: Square Enix Montreal
description:
Established in 2011, Square Enix Montréal is an award-winning mobile games studio focused on delivering innovative, creative and carefully crafted entertainment to a global audience on smartphones and tablets.
Creators of the critically acclaimed Hitman Sniper and the award-winning Hitman GO, Lara Croft GO and Deus Ex GO titles, our team of passionate experts with various backgrounds in the digital entertainment industry, all strive to make enjoyable and high-quality gaming experiences that showcase our passion for mobile games and mobile gamers.
Our ambition is to make our games accessible to even more players on mobile. To that end, while we continue to deliver outstanding and exciting games based on existing IPs, we are now developing new and original freemium mobile game experiences, therefore opening a variety of positions for talent within our studio.
At Square Enix Montréal, we pride ourselves on offering a creatively nurturing, inspiring and progressive work environment, with a genuine focus on talent development and career evolution. So, if you love mobile games as much as we do and want to further your career alongside like-minded creators, we would like to hear from you.
address: 2001 Avenue McGill College, Montreal, QC H3A 1G1, Canada

name: Strategy First
description:
The company is known for its proprietary ground breaking titles, such as the award winning “Flatout Racing”, “Ghost Master” and “S.C.S. Dangerous Waters”.
The company provides unique opportunity for independent developers seeing to market their games to a worldwide audience. Opportunities include work for hire, financing of a product and general publishing opportunities.
address: 147 Rue Saint-Paul O, Montreal, QC H2Y 1Z5, Canada

name: Thunder Lotus
description: Thunder Lotus is a maker of beautifully powerful video games. A passionate collective of AAA, indie, and mobile expats with over 40 years of combined industry experience and 20+ shipped titles, Thunder Lotus aspires to distill its visionary original IP’s into captivating interactive experiences that the team itself would love to play.
address: 1001 Rue Lenoir, Montreal, QC H4C 2Z6, Canada

name: Parabole
description: Founded in 2012, Parabole is a software development company based in Québec, Canada. We use videogame technologies to create custom-made interactive experiences for other organisations. We work with companies of all sizes in many diverse industries such as advertising, government and education. Our firm earned several awards from local organisations for its dynamic and progressive approach to B2B operations, including “Startup of the year” in 2013 by the Quebec Chamber of Commerce. Most of our projects are built for several platforms, including iOS, Android, Windows, Linux and Mac. Depending on the client needs, we use Mono-based development tools such as Unity and Xamarin to create games and apps that feel native on all supported devices. We have extensive knowledge in C# and OpenGL, a perfect combination for multiplatform solutions.
address: 276 Rue Christophe Colomb E, Quebec City, QC G1K 3T2, Canada

name: Player Research
description:
The premier games user research partner, enabling gamedev to gain meaningful insight from real players across the world. A Keywords Studio.
We want the world to experience brilliant games; ones full of adventure, surprise and intrigue - the ones you can’t put down, and those you talk about for days. Across the world, we partner with developers and publishers to realise their creative visions by providing meaningful insight into how real players experience play.

name: Playmind
description:
For more than 15 years, Playmind has been specializing in the design and development of digital media. The studio combines strategic analysis and prototypes using cutting edge technologies to create strong immersive experiences. Playmind focuses on mobile, VR, AR, console and event-based video games, on digital interactions and immersive environments for advertising, museums, events, world fairs and performances. In early 2010, the studio fully oriented its focus on the production of video game services and original IP development. With its service projects, the studio created immersive games using cutting edge technologies.
Playmind released its first IP game called The Inner Friend on September 6th 2018. The PS4 and Xbox One versions are planned for January 2019. With this first IP, the studio won multiple prizes such as the ‘Best Experimental Game’ at the Tokyo Gameshow 2018 and the ‘Best in Show’ award at MEGA 2017. Playmind successfully stamped its mark and genuine, creative and innovative mark onto the video game industry. The team is composed of more than 30 employees. By working with multidisciplinary talents coming from inside and outside the video game industry, the innovative ideas coming out of the team are strong and up to the image of an ever-changing video game industry. By working as an independant and united team, the studio aims to deliver new breed games where the players discover fantastic and immersive worlds.
address: 6749 Boul St-Laurent, Montreal, QC H2S 3C8, Canada

name: Playtika
description:
For a decade Playtika has been a pioneer in the games industry with 30 million monthly active users across a portfolio of casual games titles.
We were among the first to offer free-to-play games on social networks, and shortly after, on mobile platforms.
Playtika creates disruptive gaming experiences that are reshaping the gaming landscape using cutting-edge technologies in Live-Ops, Data Analytics and Performance Marketing. As a digital entertainment powerhouse, Playtika processes over 6TB of data daily.
As a digital entertainment powerhouse, Playtika processes over 6TB of data daily. Our creative team translate data-driven insights into customized story lines that deliver exciting challenges and surprising thrills, at every twist and every turn.
We move fast, seizing new opportunities, pushing boundaries and leveraging the technology and talent we’ve acquired along the way.
At Playtika, we are storytellers and coders, artists and data-scientists, explorers and strategists. We don’t just build games, we bring them to life. We create infinite ways to play.
Headquartered in Herzliya, Israel, Playtika has over three thousand employees in offices worldwide including Tel-Aviv, London, Berlin, Vienna, Helsinki, Montreal, Chicago, Los Angeles, Las Vegas, Santa Monica, Sydney, Buenos Aires, Tokyo, Kiev, Bucharest, Minsk, Dnepr, and Vinnytsia.

name: Polymorph Games
description: Polymorph Games was founded in February 2016 by two veteran game developers whose mission is to deliver immersive City Building experiences for PC and consoles platforms. The studio won the 3rd edition of Catapulte in 2017 with Foundation, their first original title.
address: 125 Boulevard Charest E 2e étage, Bureau 10, Quebec City, QC G1K 3G5, Canada

name: Product Madness
description:
With a swashbuckling, can-do attitude and a healthy dose of creativity, dynamism and innovation coursing through our veins, we are a trailblazer in the fast-paced world of social and mobile gaming.
The secret to Product Madness’ phenomenal growth lies in crafting the most visually stunning and immersive slots games out there. For us, it boils down to producing highly engaging gaming by enthralling our millions of players with a precise blend of science, psychology and art. 
Our passion and dedication to delivering the most amazing and fun playing experiences is reflected in our portfolio of award-winning and cutting-edge social and mobile slots games. There’s method in our Madness.

name: QuickByte Games
description: QuickByte offers co-development partnerships to small but proven independent teams that have a high potential project but need additional development and production resources to take their games to the next level. We offer best-in-class tools, sophisticated back-end technologies, hands-on development and all the necessary resources to improve commercial success. Our teams work alongside our partners with highly engaging games and distill them into indispensable experiences that stay true to their original creative values. At QuickByte we believe the best concepts do not require all the complexity you can find in some of today’s games and that the mastery of simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
address: 355 Rue Sainte-Catherine O, Montreal, QC H3B 1A5, Canada

name: Ratloop Games Canada
description:
We MAKE, PLAY and LOVE games. We put our hearts and souls (and minds and skills) into creating exciting games. We’re industry veterans who want to make a difference. We love gaming and we love what we do. Pretty sure you’ll love our games too. And oh yeah, gameplay always comes first.
We are currently working on the most kickass game.
address: 1001 Rue Lenoir, Montreal, QC H4C 2Z6, Canada

name: Riposte Games & Co
description: Over the last few years the team has developed and released top performing games across all platforms, including the titles Shop Heroes, Swords & Potions, and Card Monsters. Led by a group of savvy video game professionals, the company is built on a rock solid foundation that combines technology and art to create a fantastic player experience.
address: 2 Boulevard Desaulniers, Saint-Lambert, QC J4P 1L3, Canada

name: Kitfox Games
description: Kitfox Games is an independent Montreal-based game studio passionate about exploring and creating intriguing worlds. We're applying procedural generation techniques to narrative design to make games that constantly give players new worlds to explore and new stories to tell. Current games: Boyfriend Dungeon, Six Ages, Dwarf Fortress Previous games: The Shrouded Isle, Moon Hunters, Shattered Planet
address: 3863 Boul St-Laurent, Montreal, QC H2W 1X9, Canada

name: Lucid Dreams
description: Lucid Dreams Studio is a video game company aiming at creating high quality 2D games for PC and consoles. Our main objective is to provide to players great gameplay experience and mature stories to enjoy.

name: Ludia
description: Ludia is one of Canada's leading mobile video game companies. Founded in Montreal 12 years ago, the company welcomes more than 300 bright and enthusiastic crew members. "Creating games that touch people"​ is our daily mantra. We work hard, have fun, innovate and level-up every day. As for the development of our games, we are proud to work hand in hand with awesome partners who trust us and support our creativity. Our high-quality portfolio includes original games based on internationally recognized brands such as Dragons: Titan Uprising, Dungeons & Dragons™, Jurassic World™: Alive, What's Your Story, Jurassic World™: The Game, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legends, Dragons: Rise of Berk, and much more. To work at Ludia means to be part of a studio that knows how to preserve its human side, promote development and recognize the value of each of its employees.
address: 410 Rue Saint-Nicolas, Montreal, QC H2Y 2P5, Canada

name: M5 Games
description: We are a Canadian company who are headquartered in Toronto, Ontario but also have associates in both Montreal and Hamilton. Our goal is to design and make great games that tell unique stories and offer captivating play. We are a skilled team that can build our own tools and infrastructure but we also know when it's best to leverage third-party solutions. We are a confident and modern studio who embraces the power of freeing our team by using new technologies and better organization rather than by just squeezing them between office walls. Making games is our craft and making better games is our mission.

name: MadLife Divertissement
description: MadLife Entertainment is a start-up newly incorporated by four graduates of the Polytechnique de Montréal who met during the Ubisoft university competition. The result of their collaboration? The Zorya prototype game, which won first place in 3 categories of the competition and which was chosen across the country to represent the university level of Canada at E3 2017. What is our vision? Create games featuring fantastic and unique worlds where the player can escape on a mad imaginary excursion.

name: Meridian4
description:
Who is Meridian4? That is a good question. We’re an indie game publisher, first and foremost. Founded in 2004, we’ve published, marketed and released a collection of games created by independent developers who wanted to reach a wider audience of gamers without the hassle of self-publishing.
But this is just the cusp of who we are. The outer layer, if you will.
We love gaming. That’s why we got into this business – we’re gamers at heart. So believe us when we say, we’re passionate about the games we publish. Every game on our site is selected for its wow factor; there’s something new about it that we think gamers will enjoy (because we did). But our dedication to the game goes further than that. We ensure that the gamers’ experience is top notch, from download to game play.
When we say we’re an indie game publisher, that could mean so much. What it means for us is that we help developers publish their projects across a range of platforms - digital, PC and mobile - on a global scale. We market these games, telling as many people as we can about these new, indie games and developers. The success of our partners is important.
Our office, based in Montreal, Canada, is home to a team of software experts with over 30 years of combined experience. Every time a developer walks through our door, we put our heads together to create the best possible game. New, innovative games are our specialty, so that gamers everywhere can be entertained and challenged.
address: 320 Rue Sainte-Catherine O, Montreal, QC H2X 2A1, Canada

name: Mino Games
description:
Mino Games is a free-to-play mobile gaming studio that produced the top 50 grossing mobile game Mino Monsters, with over 13 million downloads. We create deeply engaging, widely appealing games for millions of fans. We’re currently building our world class development studio in Montreal.
We are a small group of passionate engineers, artists and analysts with a mission to create games that millions of people all around the world love to play for years. We are funded by the best angel investors, institutional investors, and gaming companies from across the world.
Our third and latest game, Cat Game, has already hit the App Store’s Top 100 Grossing Chart in Canada. Launched in Summer 2019, Cat Game is showing world class key metrics, and is a global hit achieving huge success for the company.
address: sternthal Building, 1435 St Alexander St, Montreal, QC H3A 2G4, Canada

name: Minority Media
description:
These innovators include the creators of some of the world's leading game franchises, including FIFA, Batman, Splinter Cell, Rainbow 6, GTA, Deus Ex, Assasin's Creed, James Bond, Need for Speed, and many others.
Founded in 2010, Minority is an award-winning creator of turnkey Multiplayer VR Platforms and games for Location-Based Entertainment (LBE) venues. Our systems offer the highest revenue for operators thanks to unique Curb Appeal, the smallest Footprint in their class and outstanding quality of content. Minority's game systems are currently in operation in the US, Canada, Mexico and Asia.
address: 5377 Boul St-Laurent, Montreal, QC H2T 1S5, Canada

name: Nine Dots
description:
To achieve this, we treat developers like human beings and video games like art rather than toys.
No overwhelming NDA, no non-concurrence agreements, no crunch time. We build our own projects and make games we want to play and are passionate about. Everyone here has a creative input on the game, no one is just a cog in the machine.
Believe it or not, that makes us incredibly efficient at developing games.
address: 276 Rue Christophe Colomb E, Quebec City, QC G1K 3T2, Canada

name: Empty Clip Studios
description:
Empty Clip Studios was founded in 2007 in San Diego. Since 2010, we’ve also been located in Québec City, Canada (“ECS Quebec”).
​Despite remaining a small operation, we’ve released 22 games on multiple platforms for a total of over 46 SKU’s in the last 12 years, mainly using our proprietary multiplatform RapidFire Engine.
​We've created 8 original titles, some for the biggest names in entertainment such as Final Fantasy and Ghostbusters, as well as our own fully original award-winning indie game Symphony.
address: 402 W Broadway, San Diego, CA 92101, USA

name: Epic Games
description: Founded in 1991, Epic Games is a leading interactive entertainment company and provider of 3D engine technology. Epic operates Fortnite, the world’s largest game with over 350 million accounts and 2.5 billion friend connections. Epic also develops Unreal Engine, which powers the world’s leading games and is being adopted across industries such as film and television, architecture, automotive, and manufacturing for visualization and simulation. Epic has over 2,200 employees across 35 offices worldwide with headquarters in Cary, North Carolina.

name: Frima
description:
Our team also specializes in animation, special FX, and connected toys.
Titans of the entertainment industry such as Lego, Mattel, Microsoft, Ubisoft, and Zynga trust us with their brands. Always aiming to be at the head of the pack, we stretch the limits of our ambitions by creating original properties such as FATED, Chariot, and Nun Attack.
Frima offers dynamic careers with great advancement potential in game design, programming, concept art, 2D/3D art & animation, VFX, and so much more. Our work-personal life balance philosophy gives our teams free rein to innovate and entertain on a daily basis.
address: 395 Rue Victor Revillon, Quebec City, QC G1K 3M9, Canada

name: Gearbox Software
description:
Gearbox Software is an award-winning, independent developer of interactive entertainment. It was founded in 1999 by game industry veterans, and its first release was Half-Life: Opposing Force. Since then, the company has become known for successful game franchises including Brothers in Arms, Borderlands, and Battleborn, as well as acquired properties Duke Nukem and Homeworld.
Gearbox Software's ambition is to entertain the world and it's key driving objectives include the pursuit of happiness for our talent, partners and customers, the prioritization of entertainment and creativity and a measured respect for profitability.
Gearbox Software is headquartered in Frisco, Texas, north of downtown Dallas. With its exceptional public schools, low cost of living, energetic nightlife, fantastic professional and college sports teams, and amazing shopping and restaurants the Dallas metroplex has something for everyone.

name: Gingear Studio
address: 2610 Avenue de la Ronde, Quebec City, QC G1J 4G6, Canada

name: GolemLabs
description:
GolemLabs is a French-Canadian video games developer based in Sherbrooke (QC), founded in 2000 with the mission of designing original and intelligent games to satisfy a growing need of novelty and freshness to the video games industry.
The company's first title, SuperPower, struck a cord with more than 200,000 gamers worldwide.
address: 65 Rue Belvédère N, Sherbrooke, QC J1H 4A7, Canada

name: KO_OP
description: Founded in 2012, we've been experimenting with games and interactive art ever since. In 2014 we established the KOLAB fund, a small stipend for outside artists to make games with our help.

name: Kabam
description:
Kabam is a world leader of developing entertaining, immersive, and highly social multiplayer games. They merge consumer behavior with the art of game design to create experiences that are enjoyed by millions of players across the globe. Each game has raised the benchmark in mobile gaming, bringing high-quality graphics, next-generation technology and revolutionary gameplay to the palm of player’s hands.
Kabam has partnered with leading entertainment brands like Disney, Hasbro and Universal to create mobile games based on some of the world’s most iconic franchises.
Kabam’s games have generated hundreds of millions of downloads including Marvel Contest of Champions, Disney Mirrorverse, Shop Titans, Transformers: Forged to Fight, Mini Guns, Fast & Furious 6: The Game, Fast & Furious: Legacy and Blastron. Many of these games have also received multiple awards such as Apple’s Editor’s Choice and Google Play’s Best Game of the Year.
Founded in 2006, Kabam has studios and offices in Vancouver, Montreal, Charlottetown, San Francisco and Austin. Kabam is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Netmarble Games.
address: 1118 Alberni St, Vancouver, BC V6E 1A5, Canada

name: Borealys Games
description: In the early months of 2014, two friends got together to discuss the creation of a new game studio. They pitched a game project to investors and kicked off the pre-production of Mages of Mystralia in September of the same year. The team grew steadily as Mages of Mystralia finally shipped on PC, XOne and PS4. The debut title received praise from press and players alike, winning numerous awards and nominations for its design, art and music. Borealys Games strives to conceive games that have all the ingenuity and passion of indie games, while remaining polished and accessible; a feat made possible by the complementary experiences of its core team.
address: 4529 Rue Clark, Montreal, QC H2T 2T3, Canada

name: Breaking Walls
description:
Established in 2015 by three industry veterans, Breaking Walls
is an independent game studio with a clear mission: to create immersive, visually stunning, story-rich entertainment experiences.
With decades of experience working on major AAA titles such as Assassin's Creed, Prince of Persia, and Far Cry, our team has spent the last four years developing AWAY: The Survival Series.
address: 50 Rue Queen #101, Montreal, QC H3C 2N5, Canada

name: Cardbord Utopia
description:
Putting the skills of our experienced designers and programmers to good use, we aim at creating engaging experiences through technical game design that translates into deep mechanics for the players to obsess over. We also founded Cardboard Utopia on the belief that the best, most cherished games are the ones that generate thoughts & emotions. To do so, we want to exploit the storytelling power of the video game medium and craft original, rich stories with diverse characters which will resonate with a wide range of players.
Children of Zodiarcs is Cardboard Utopia’s first project.
Cardboard Utopia’s team is made of passionate, talented and experienced developers, many of which have known the AAA blockbuster trenches. We've worked on games such as the
Assassin's Creed franchise (Brotherhood, Recollections), Far Cry 3, and Rainbow6 Patriots.
address: sternthal Building, 1435 St Alexander St, Montreal, QC H3A 2G4, Canada

name: Cathar Games
description: We’re an experienced group of developers who bring visions to life across multiple platforms in the highest fidelity. Whether you're looking to get a plug-and-play game or need something to help you build the epic game you've imagined, Cathar Games has a solution for you.
address: 150 Avenue Claudel, Quebec City, QC G1P 2B6, Canada

name: Chainsawesome Games
description: Founded in 2012, Chainsawesome Games is a small independent studio composed of chainsaw aficionados with a shared passion for carving action-packed and multiplayer-focused games for PC and Consoles. Their games received several honorable mentions and prizes such as Best Audio Design at Intel Level Up 2013 and Destructoid’s Best of PAX East 2015 award. In 2014, they won the first prize at the Pixel Challenge 48-hour Game Jam with their first iteration of Knight Squad. Chainsawesome Games is based in Quebec City, Canada where poutine is actually good and winters last entire generations.
address: 276 Rue Christophe Colomb E, Quebec City, QC G1K 3T2, Canada

name: Compulsion Games
description: Their first game is titled Contrast.
address: 1001 Rue Lenoir, Montreal, QC H4C 2Z6, Canada

name: CyberConnect2
description: Founded in 1996 as CyberConnect, they released two games, before changing their name in 2001 and releasing .hack//Infection in Japan a year later. They are best known for the .Hack and Naruto Ultimate Ninja series's.
address: 10f, 1-chōme-5-1 Hakata Ekimae, Hakata Ward, Fukuoka, 812-0011, Japan

name: Double Stallion
description: We build clever and reliable systems to bring bold and vibrant player experiences to life. We are the developers of Speed Brawl, Big Action Mega Fight!, and are currently developing CONV/RGENCE: A League of Legends Story in collaboration with Riot Forge. Punch up, double down.
address: 642 Rue de Courcelle, Montreal, QC H4C 3C7, Canada

name: Eidos Montréal
description: Eidos-Montréal (a Square Enix studio) is focused on creating immersive and captivating experiences. For the last decade, the development teams at Eidos-Montréal have orchestrated the successful reboot of the DEUS EX series (Deus Ex: Human Revolution, Deus Ex: Mankind Divided), released the latest entry in the THIEF franchise, and have also played a key role in the development of the award-winning TOMB RAIDER series. To ensure its creative vision can be realized in-game, the studio has developed its own cutting-edge technology, the Dawn Engine. The studio also provides technical support for Square Enix operations around the world, including research and development, quality assurance, and playtests.
address: 400 Boulevard de Maisonneuve O 5th Floor, Montreal, QC H3A 1L4, Canada

name: 3Mind Games
description: 3Mind Games is an independent company dedicated to develop high quality video games and interactive entertainment that are original, innovative and rich in emotion. The company was founded in 2010 by two motivated veterans, in the industry since 1997.
address: 3981 Boul St-Laurent, Montreal, QC H2W 1Y4, Canada

name: Adrenaline Amusements
description:
Adrenaline Amusements was founded in 2010 with a mission to create entertainment products for the kid in all of us. Our award-winning games are so addictively entertaining that they offer one-of-a-kind experiences that simply cannot be found anywhere else.
Our R&D team is made up of seasoned experts with decades of experience in applied research, industrial design, as well as electrical and mechanical engineering.
Because all of our products are entirely manufactured and assembled in our plant in Canada, Adrenaline maintains complete control of the production process—even the smallest details. Each product undergoes lengthy and rigorous testing by our quality control department to ensure stellar quality that our discerning clients have come to expect.
In 2013, Adrenaline Amusements acquired Sarbakan, one of the longest-standing and experienced video game studios in Canada. Today, the combined strengths of the two companies have enabled Adrenaline to create arcade products that are more original, more innovative and more revenue-generating than ever before.
address: 2273 Rue Antonio Héroux, Terrebonne, QC J6X 4J8, Canada

name: Artifact 5
description:
Artifact 5 is a boutique company that creates distinct surreal and emotionally driven games for PC, console and VR. Artifact 5 diverges from the pack by creating new modes of storytelling through mechanics. The way our games progress through narrative is married with the controls themselves. As a small agile indie studio, Artifact 5 has the flexibility to expand our expertise in PC, console, and VR and other mediums across genres and projects.
We are currently focused on a witchy RPG project for PC and console.
Our studio has won awards from Game Connection America, the Montreal Independent Games Festival, and the Boston Festival of Indie Games. We have been showcased at IndieCade, Day of the Devs, Fantastic Fest, the PAX East 2018 Indie Megabooth, the Festival NewImages 2018, and were nominated at the A.MAZE 2018 awards in Berlin.
address: sternthal Building, 1435 St Alexander St, Montreal, QC H3A 2G4, Canada

name: Behaviour Interactive
description: Behaviour Interactive, Canada’s largest independent game developer and publisher, was founded in 1992. The company boasts over 600 employees in its Montreal studio and more than 70 million games sold. With its award-winning original IP Dead by Daylight and the upcoming strategy RPG Game of Thrones Beyond the Wall, Behaviour continues to grow as a leading global developer. Behaviour counts amongst its partners some of the world’s most renowned brands including Activision, Microsoft, Nintendo, Sony, Ubisoft and many more.
address: 6666 St Urbain St #500, Montreal, QC H2S 3H1, Canada

name: Berzerk Studio
description:
Some men aren't looking for anything logical. They can't be easily bought, criticised or reasoned with. They just want to hit large ugly things very hard with a large blunt object and collect large amounts of currencies.
This is the premise on what Berzerk Studio has been built, to make games that we want to play. If we don't find a game fun to play, a story interesting to read, a joke hilariously horrible, we can hardly expect you guys to now can we? Since its inception in the dark and moldy basement of our fearless art director, the studio has been doing just that, bringing educative in all the wrong places games filled with protein stuffed meats, sturdy metal hats and eardrum shattering metal soundtracks to a grey world that had been flooded with very un-metal products with almost no meat references, not to mention very few hats. Here at Berzerk Studio, we don't see our games as products, except maybe a product of the unholy union of our blood tears and sweat. *daawwwww soundboard*.
Editor's note: At the moment of the initial writing of this article, the author wasn't aware of popular games such as Super Meat Boy and Team Fortress 2 that do in fact star various meats and hats, we wholeheartedly apologize for the oversight, the employee has been since fired and his family immolated.

name: Bishop Games
description: Bishop Games is an indie games studio based in the heart of Quebec City, Canada. We're a bunch of video games fanatics trying to make it big. Our mission is simple: to make fun and unique video games our own way. Like the bishop in chess, we make our own path in the industry. Bishop Games started as a crazy dream between three aspiring and ambitious young men that grew up with video games, to become a goal and project fueled by our own body and soul.
address: 771 Rue Saint-Joseph E, Quebec City, QC G1K 8B6, Canada

name: Bkom Studios
description:
We are the most complete offering in the field of “Play”, able to create it, monetize it, promote it, and keep it alive.
BKOM Studios is a full-service digital studio dedicated to helping brands develop their presence across multiple points of interaction and platforms, including products, points of sale, websites, apps, social media, marketing campaigns and mobile games.
More than 90 talented people work in our studios located in Quebec City, Canada, and in Los Angeles, USA. We also create our own original games and intellectual properties (IP), exploring further the digital space, creating new universes, and experimenting cutting-edge technologies.
address: 825 Boulevard Lebourgneuf, Quebec City, QC G2J 0B9, Canada

name: Sakari Games
description: Sakari Games was founded in 2008 and aims to deliver unique games for the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Network. In 2009, Sakari Games also started a division that focuses on casual games for the PC and Mac.

name: Wallonia Game Developers Association
description:
We proactively promote games, game studios, people, education, events and training centers from Wallonia. WALGA delivers all materials relevant to gaming and serious gaming in Wallonia and act as a hub to make sure people are aware of things that are happening in the network.
We regroup all Wallonia individuals and companies active in or connected to the games industry. We try to foster and nurture an active network of professionnals and students through events and meetings organized by third parties, partners or directly by the association.
We represent its members in communication with government, non-gaming businesses, international organizations and encourages them to share info and knowledge in and outside of Wallonia. We partner with local associations (FLEGA, GameIN) to promote Wallonia and the belgian games industry outside of our borders.
address: Avenue Guibal et Devillez 1, 7000 Mons, Belgium

name: BISBOG
description:
BISBOG a publisher and developer of free-to-play online and mobile games. It is based in Lausanne, Switzerland and has offices in Brighton, United Kingdom.
BISBOG strives to publish games with an original game play, which are targeted at casual to mid-core gamers. It develops and publishes its own games and publishes games by independent developers.

name: Gbanga, Millform
description:
Gbanga provides a platform for individually tailored mixed-reality games. Through mobile software and a feature-packed website, Gbanga delivers entertaining, informative and/or educational content to playing end-consumers. Sponsors might place branded content into the platform, too.
Gbanga is developed and managed by Millform AG, a Swiss private company.

name: Giants Software
description: GIANTS Software is one of the most successful game developers in Europe, with offices in Zürich, Switzerland, Erlangen, Germany, and Brno, Czech Republic. It is well known for its “Farming Simulator” series, a worldwide best-selling game and real-time simulation, for many years.

name: Niantic
description:
Niantic is the world’s leading AR technology company, sparking creative and engaging journeys in the real world. Our products inspire outdoor exploration, exercise, and meaningful social interaction.
Originally formed at Google in 2011, we became an independent company in 2015 with a strong group of investors including Nintendo, The Pokémon Company, and Alsop Louie Partners. Our current titles include pioneering global-control game Ingress, record-breaking AR game Pokémon GO, and recently released third title, Harry Potter: Wizards Unite.
Niantic is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We believe that cultivating a workplace where our people are supported and included is essential to creating great products our community will love. Our mission emphasizes seeking and hiring diverse voices, including those who are traditionally underrepresented in the technology industry, and we consider this to be one of the most important values we hold close.
We're a hard-working, fun, and exciting group who value intellectual curiosity and a passion for problem-solving! We have growing offices located in San Francisco, Sunnyvale, Bellevue, Los Angeles, London, Tokyo, Hamburg, and Zurich.

name: Plaion
description: Through most of the 2000s, KOCH published many Nintendo titles, including the childrens line of games called Let's Play.

name: Swiss Game Developers Association
description: The SGDA represents the Swiss Game industry, the companies and its professionals, organizes community events and advocates games in politics. The non-profit organisation’s goals are a supportive political environment, professionalisation through promotion of knowhow and young talents as well as the increased visibility of a strong Swiss game industry. The SGDA hosts the Swiss Game Awards which honours Swiss innovation in games.

name: 01 Studio
description: We focus on multiplayer games and are located outside of Montreal.

name: Wargaming.net
description:
Wargaming is an award-winning online game developer and publisher headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus. Delivering legendary games since 1998, Wargaming has grown to become one of the leaders in the free-to-play MMO gaming industry with 5,0000+ employees in multiple offices around the world.
Over 200 million players enjoy Wargaming’s titles, including the top-of-the-line projects World of Tanks, World of Warships, World of Tanks Console, and World of Warships Legends, across all major gaming platforms.
Today, we also actively create mobile products within the MS-1 studio that develops colorful games for mobile and portable platforms. The team's portfolio includes the World of Tanks Blitz cross-platform shooter that has been downloaded more than 120 million times worldwide. A career with our company means always meeting interesting challenges and gaining valuable experience while working with world-class experts. Take your place among our passionate and experienced team and bring out the best in yourself at Wargaming!

name: Belgian Entertainment Association
description:
The Belgian Entertainment Association represents the interests of the different branches of the entertainment industry: music, film distribution and video games. BEA acts on behalf of all branches where there are overarching interests.
BEA consists of three branch associations: BEA Music, BEA Interactive and ABDF/VFDB

name: Belgian Games
description: Being in the heart of Europe, Belgian game companies are used to working with many different contexts, people, cultures. As long as we can have a beer once in a while, we’ll be more than fine.

name: Black Land Studio
description: The company was founded by Arnaud, Guillaume and Arnaud (yes, two Arnaud in the team. Stay focus) in January 2017. Brought together by their passion for strong coffee (black, no sugar) and presumptuously convinced that they have something to add to the gaming world, they decided to create amazing games. Focusing on neat mechanisms, easy to grasp concepts and strong visual identity, the studio creates fun games on PC and consoles.

name: FLEGA
description: FLEGA, the official Flemish Games Association supports the Flemish games industry as a whole. FLEGA groups all Flemish individuals and companies active in or connected to the Flemish games industry. FLEGA defends and proactively promotes the interests of its members. FLEGA partners with other local associations to promote Flanders and the BelgianGamesIndustry outside of our borders.

name: Larian Studios
description: Larian's most successful and widely acclaimed game franchise is the Divinity series which is made up of the isometric RPGs Divine Divinity, Beyond Divinity and Divinity II: Ego Draconis, which was released in 2009. Other games released by Larian Studios include The L. E. D. Wars and KetnetKick 1&2.

name: Mantis Games
description:
Based in the city of Ghent, Belgium, Mantis is an independent game development studio founded in 2018.
With a focus on VR, AR and other emerging technologies, Mantis is committed to making games that are meaningful, memorable and, above all, fun!

name: Storybird Games
description: Storybird Games is a small French development team, creator of the iOS game Finding Teddy.

name: Pretty French Games
description: Pretty French Games is a one-man studio based in Paris, France, founded by Simon Andersen, former Machine Learning Engineer at Nvidia. Simon strives to create games that build upon his beloved classics with unique mechanics and exciting worlds to discover. Pale Night is the studio’s debut title. The original soundtrack for the game is composed by Zenibuka.

name: SELL
description:
SELL promotes and defends the collective interests of publishers in the various fields in which they are involved and under the various professional, economic or legal aspects that concern them and thus contributes to the structuring of the market.
SELL supports the European PEGI standard, a true classification system for video game content that offers reliable and easy-to-understand information in the form of labels appearing on packaging.
SELL organizes industry highlights: - IDEF, the annual B2B video game show - Paris Games Week (304,000 visitors in 2017)

name: SNJV
description: SNJV intervenes in all areas allowing to preserve or develop the competitiveness of video game production companies established in France. Public policies to guarantee the international competitiveness of video game creation companies. Regulatory and legislative measures adapted to the sustainable development of the sector.

name: Sanuk Games
description:
Established in 2004, with a development studio in Thailand and a publishing arm in France, Sanuk Games has shipped more than 70 games on almost all systems and in a variety of genres.
Games shipped include:
- Pro Fishing Simulator (PC, PS4, Xbox One)
- Brickbreaker (Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One, Wii U)
- Tetraminos (Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One, Wii U)
- Mahjong (Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One, Wii U)
- Bombing Bastards (Switch, PS4/Vita, Xbox One, Wii U, PC, mobile)
- Spot The Differences! (Switch, Wii U, web, mobile)
Past clients for work-for-hire include: Activision, Avanquest Software, Bigben Interactive, Eidos Interactive, Mindscape, Samsung Mobile, Sony Computer Entertainment, Ubisoft.
address: Pak Kret, Pak Kret District, Nonthaburi 11120, Thailand

name: Shine Research
description:
Shine Research is a cross-platform software development company. We combine :
Solid technical background and development experience
Good knowledge of business needs
Agile development methods
This allows us to guarantee the delivering of high quality products on time, in accordance with defined budget.

name: Neko Entertainment
address: 38 Rue de la République, 93100 Montreuil, France

name: Plug In Digital
description: Plug In Digital is one of the largest independent video game distributors. We help studios and publishers distributing their games worldwide on PC, consoles and mobile. We are a driving force behind indie successes such as Dead Cells, FURI or Northgard and a key partner for high-profile companies such as SNK, Raw Fury, Paradox, Konami, Bigben, Bandai Namco, CI Games or Curve Digital. Dear Villagers, our publishing label, is a warm hearted invitation to join us in a place where talented studios can unleash their creativity and where players enjoy playful, distinctive and audacious games made for PC and consoles.

name: Focus Home Interactive
description: "Focus Home Interactive is a French publisher based in Paris, France. Known for the quality, diversity and originality of its catalogue, Focus has published and distributed original titles that have become benchmark titles worldwide, available both in store and for download across the world. Focus publishes games on all major platforms, consoles and PC."

name: Dear Villagers
description:
Dear Villagers is a warm-hearted invitation to join the little unusual neighbourhood we are building within the gaming industry, a place where talented studios can unleash their creativity so that players can enjoy distinctive and audacious games.
We scout for the most creative developers worldwide and help them achieve higher goals for their projects.
From RPG to Action-Adventure, from Rhythm to Survival, we are patiently building a playful line-up on PC & Consoles.
Dear Villagers is the publishing branch of Plug In Digital.
address: 1348 Av. de la Mer-Raymond Dugrand, 34000 Montpellier, France

name: Eversim
description:
Eversim specializes in creating simulation, strategy and role-playing network games. Its products are dedicated to public and to professionals of defense and security sectors for training and learning (serious gaming).
The development of these innovative products is backed by such prestigious bodies as Bpifrance, the Direction Générale de l’Armement (DGA) and CNC.
Eversim was founded in February 2004 by three partners: André and Louis-Marie Rocques and Pascal Einsweiler. The company is based in Lognes (Marne-La-Vallée) east of Paris and receives financial backing from a group of investors from Ile de France.
Eversim’s founders have worked together for over twenty five years in the world of video games, and were around when the industry was in its infancy in the 1980’s. Between 1987 and 2003, they created, under the Silmarils label, more than thirty products for consoles and computers that were sold throughout the world.
address: 20 Rue du Suffrage Universel, 77185 Lognes, France

name: Capcom
description:
In 1983 Capcom Co., Ltd was founded and soon built a reputation for introducing cutting-edge technology and software to the video game market. Now an industry leader in the video game industry for 25 years, Capcom's legacy of historic franchises in home and arcade gaming are testaments to an unparalleled commitment to excellence.
Building on its origins as a game machine manufacturer, Capcom is now involved in all areas of the video game industry and has offices in Tokyo, Osaka, California, England, Germany and Hong Kong.
Groundbreaking franchises like Resident Evil, Street Fighter, Devil May Cry, Monster Hunter, Ace Attorney and the Mega Man series set the standard in creative innovation, character development and unsurpassed gameplay. Guided by the idea of fostering a culture of entertainment, Capcom has consistently acted on this view by creating innovative and hugely popular games that push technical and creative limits.

name: Clickteam
description:
Clickteam is the development group behind award winning software titles such as Klik and Play, The Games Factory and Multimedia Fusion.
Clickteam has been a reality for more than 15 years now.
The heart of Clickteam is made of developers, so expect a different approach from us than you’d get from the usual marketing driven companies. We have more passion and pay more attention to detail to the quality of our products and our code.
Innovative and practical products
All our products will aim to have a different approach to what else is currently on the market. We’ll always aim to design in more features than what already exists.
Products that are tested and stable
It’s always our intention to release bug-free software. There will be many opportunities for you to test Beta versions of our new products.

name: AGEod
description:
AGEod (AGE Online Distribution) is a developer and publisher of PC games. The company is incorporated in France and has its head office located in Grenoble. The company specializes in developing history oriented strategy video games built with its proprietary Adaptive Game Engine (AGE), and also publishes third-party titles. AGEod's main goal is offering to players original, cultural, and gaming creations developed by small independent studios and producers that have trouble finding an outlet within the traditional organization of the market.
AGEod was founded by Philippe Thibaut (designer of board game Europa Universalis, Pax Romana and Great Invasions) and Philippe Malacher (AGE engine creator) in 2005.
The first game distributed by AGEod was Birth of America, a turn-based strategy game about the French and Indian War that took place in the Seven Years' War, and also the American War of Independence. The second game, Ageod's American Civil War, is also a realistic historical turn-based strategy game about the American Civil War including political and economic options. The third game, Napoleon's Campaigns, is the successor of "Birth of America" with a tight focus on strategy during the Napoleonic Wars. In 2008, AGEod released Birth of America 2: Wars in America, which expanded the previous game Birth of America by a larger map, new rules, and new scenarios and campaigns.
On 17 December 2009, AGEod was acquired by Paradox Interactive.[3] In 2012, Paradox France was split away from Paradox Development Studio to work exclusively on games utilizing the AGE engine, with full autonomy. Development of Napoleon's Campaigns II was shifted from being partially developed by Paradox Development Studio to being solely developed by them, utilizing the Clausewitz engine.
For its own titles, AGEod created and further developed AGE, a generic platform for turn-based strategy games, that is expandable and adaptable to different game scenarios. The engine comes in three main versions which in simplest terms determines the breadth and depth of the game which is built upon it. The scope may be heavily oriented towards a traditional war game (e.g., Birth of America, Napoleon's Campaigns, Birth of America 2: Wars in America) or much higher level with elements of country management, diplomacy, resource management (e.g., Ageod's American Civil War), and grand strategy considerations (e.g., Pride of Nations). The modularity of AGE allows AGEod to back port many features of recent releases to existing titles, practising a patch policy that goes beyond mere bug fixing.

name: Assoria
description: Assoria is a French video games, serious games and tools development company.

name: Wako Factory
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France

address: Saint Genis des Fontaines, Languedoc-Roussillon-Midi-Pyrenees, France

name: Numeric Pipeline
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France

name: mzonestudio
address: Pornic, Pays de la Loire, France

name: Metaphore Games
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France

name: Ishtar Games
description: Ishtar Games est un studio de développement et d’édition de jeux indépendants. Nous avons notamment développé : La série de jeux de survie « Dead in » (Dead in Bermuda - 2015 et Dead in Vinland - 2018)The Last Spell, un tactical RPG avec des mécaniques de Roguelite sorti d’Early-Access en mars 2023Lakeburg Legacies un jeu de simulation de gestion d'un village médiéval centré sur la vie amoureuse de ses habitants Ishtar Games est également éditeur pour : Lakeburg Legacies, Spirited Thief, World of Aria et Forgotten Mines.Chez Ishtar Games, nous sommes avant tout des joueur·euse·s : nous avons à coeur de créer et d’éditer des jeux auxquels nous aimerions jouer nous-mêmes et qui reflètent nos valeurs. Nos jeux sont complexes mais accessibles, mixant souvent différents genres.

name: Fresh3D
address: Pornichet, Pays de la Loire, France

name: Gamepulp
address: Cholet, Pays de la Loire, France

name: Casus Ludi
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France

name: A-Game Sudios
address: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France

name: Ketchapp
description: Avec plus de 2 milliards de téléchargements et 200 jeux publiés sur Android et iOS, Ketchapp est l'un des acteurs les plus emblématiques de l'industrie hypercasual !

name: TWO BUTTONS
description: Two Buttons est un petit studio indépendant de développement de jeux vidéo fondé en 2022 et basé à Toulouse, en France.Face à une offre culturelle et vidéoludique de plus en plus riche, il est de plus en plus difficile de capter l'attention des joueurs. Notre objectif est donc de concevoir des jeux faciles à prendre en main, tout en offrant un gameplay riche et stimulant.Notre premier jeu en développement, Take the King! est un puzzle game basé sur les règles des échecs, repensé pour offrir des défis intellectuels originaux. Plongez dans des puzzles stratégiques et laissez-vous séduire par nos graphismes enchanteurs et notre atmosphère immersive.Nous sommes spécialisés dans le développement de jeux vidéo sur la plateforme Unity. En plus de notre activité de développement interne, nous offrons également des services de développement externalisé. Que vous soyez une petite entreprise cherchant à concrétiser votre vision de jeu ou un studio à la recherche d'une collaboration créative, nous sommes là pour vous aider à réaliser vos projets. Vous avez un besoin ? Contactez-nous pour en discuter !
address: 5 rue du Prof Pierre Vellas 31300 Toulouse

name: Threevision
description: Threevision est un studio de jeu vidéo Français créant des expériences mémorables au travers d’un gameplay amusant et des nouvelles technologies.

name: CARPOOL STUDIO
description: Formé et composé de vétérans de l'industrie du jeu vidéo, CARPOOL Studio est un studio de développement à taille humaine basé à Montpellier et Paris.Réuni par une passion et une expertise commune pour les expériences multijoueurs ou coopératives, nous avons l'ambition de créer des jeux et des IP immersives et uniques dans lesquelles les joueurs pourront vivre des moments forts émotionnellement. Nous accordons une attention toute particulière a la mise en scène au service de l'experience de jeu.Il n'y a pas d'autres objectifs plus gratifiants et motivants pour nous.

name: SUNNY LAB
description: Sunny Lab a été fondé en 2022. Nous nous sommes rassemblé·es autour de notre amour pour les jeux en 2D et le désir de créer des histoires qui offrent des perspectives d'espoir. Notre premier projet est un jeu d'aventure puzzle RPG où on incarne une gentille sorcière, Lunne, qui ouvre une boulangerie à Paris et dont le pain soigne les émotions par magie !

name: STUDIO CAMELIA
description: Headquartered in Montpellier, France, Camelia is a video game development studio founded in 2021 out of a love for J-RPGs. We want to bring modernity to the genre through themes, gameplay and worlds – for experienced and new players alike.We are driven by progressive values of empathy and kindness with an emphasis on showing how great games can be made in a sustainable way.
address: 199 rue Hélène Boucher 34170 Castelnau Le Lez

name: ALBYON
description: En décembre 2019, le groupe Média Immersif AtlasV lance ALBYON, son premier studio spécialisé dans les expériences immersives et le jeu vidéo.Dirigé par des vétérans des industries du jeu vidéo et de l’animation 3D, nous sommes une équipe soudée et passionnée qui œuvre chaque jour à repousser les limites du médium pour raconter les histoires qui nous tiennent à coeur.

name: BELETTE TEAM STUDIO
description: Studio de développement de jeux vidéo

name: QUANTY BANDIT
description: quanty bandit est un studio de jeux vidéo indépendant basé à Montpellier, co-fondé par Pascal Ruiz et Bruno Hurth.Son activité principale s’articule autour de la création de jeux vidéo innovants connectés à Twitch.

name: TOWER FIVE
description: Tower Five is and will remain a human size studio with a family mentality. Our apartment-style office is located in the cool town center of La Rochelle, 15 minutes by foot from the nearest beach. And still only 2.5 hours from Paris by train.We are a console-focused studio, both physical (Playstation / Xbox / Switch) and cloud (Stadia / Luna). Development is led by industry veterans with more than 20 years of experience, who are huge believers in simplicity over sophistication.At Tower five, we believe in trust, flexible hours and in responsibility: freedom and the accountability that comes with it.Come as you are but be nice to others, great games are made by good people, before all!

name: REVOLT GAMES
description: Nous créons des jeux sociaux basés sur la géographie du monde réel. Notre mission est de transformer notre environnement en un immense plateau de jeu. Dans Neopolis, notre premier jeu, (Re)découvrez votre ville, achetez des bâtiments du monde réel.  Collaborez ou rivalisez avec les personnes qui vous entourent.

name: HOMECOMING STUDIO
description: Indie video game studio. We released in coproduction with Maratus Games, ARISEN, and we are working on our new game. We also help game studios with their marketing, business and producing challenges.
address: 199 RUE HELENE BOUCHER 34170 CASTELNAU LE LEZ

name: TOCCGAMES
address: 15 RUE MARLENE DIETRICH 95220 HERBLAY SUR SEINE

name: OOM-Games
description: Nous sommes un studio indépendant qui créons des shoot 'em ups innovants sur mobile !OOM veut dire Out Of Mana, car nous créons de la magie !

name: DOWINO
description: DOWiNO est un studio de création fondé en 2013 dont le métier est de sensibiliser, éduquer, former à des problématiques à fort impact social. Développement durable, responsabilité sociale, santé publique, handicap ou encore solidarité : ces sujets complexes nécessitent des outils simples à utiliser, que nous concevons sur-mesure pour répondre aux objectifs pédagogiques de chaque projet. Nos dispositifs sont conçus pour des associations, des entreprises privées et des institutions publiques, faisant de DOWiNO un acteur de référence du Serious Game et du Game for Change !

name: NOD STUDIO
description: NOD STUDIO a comme activité principale le développement et l’édition de jeux vidéo en ligne. Notre premier jeu, Dwarfs Fight, est le jeu 100% Free-To-Play de tactique en ligne orienté joueur contre joueur, disponible sur PC et Mobile. NOD STUDIO est aussi une entreprise de service numérique dédiée au développement informatique web et mobile.Nous avons une solide expérience dans la réalisation de projets pour de grandes entreprises et avons à notre actif de nombreuses références dans ce domaine. Nous travaillons principalement en extension de vos équipes techniques mais également en mode projet.Durant les projets nous mettons à votre disposition notre expertise pour comprendre vos enjeux et trouver les meilleures solutions pour réaliser vos applications.

name: GEMELLI GAMES
description: Gemelli Games est un studio de jeux vidéo indépendant fondé en 2022. Notre mission est de développer des jeux originaux et ambitieux dans un environnement de travail sain et épanouissant.Nous développons actuellement Skygard Arena, un jeu de stratégie au tour par tour dans un univers heroic fantasy coloré. Le jeu combine des mécaniques classiques de RPGs tactiques (contrôle d'une équipe de plusieurs personnages, combat tactique au tour par tour...) et des touches modernes inspirées des MOBAs (des personnages en 3D avec une identité forte, des combats rapides et dynamiques et un mode PvP).

name: GAMELEON STUDIO
description: GAMELEON STUDIO est un studio de développement et d'outsourcing proposant une large gamme de compétences et de services pour vos besoins de production.Nous mettons nos talents à votre service dans tous les styles requis, du projet indépendant au AAA, du réaliste au stylisé, en veillant à correspondre au styleet à la direction artistique de vos projets en temps réel. Notre équipe vous accompagnera dans la création de vos personnages, environnement, FX.vegetation et optimisation que ce soit en 3D ou 2D, sous Unity©, Unreal Engine© ainsi qu'avec des moteurs propriétaires.
